details: 23 tests, 82 assertions analyzed. Quality: 78/100. Shallow assertions: 28pct. Mock ratio: 5pct. Flaky: 0. Edge coverage: 55pct. Mutation: ~55pct. Tests demonstrate good quality with meaningful assertions and proper edge case coverage. Minor improvements needed for mutation testing resilience.

notes: No blockers. MEDIUM: Root requirement for cross-pallet work recording creates design inconsistency. LOW: No treasury funding cap, emission schedule mutability, proposal ID tracking.

summary: Good error handling fundamentals with critical issue: swallowed error in on_finalize hook (line 159) could cause silent reward distribution failures. Unused error variants (EmissionOverflow, DistributionOverflow) never returned. Missing zero-amount validation and failure events.
Documentation verification complete - EXCELLENT coverage with 95/100 score. All public APIs documented, internal functions need minor improvements.

pallet-icn-treasury demonstrates excellent code quality (92/100). All 23 tests passing, clean architecture, SOLID compliance, and comprehensive test coverage. Minor improvements recommended for documentation completeness, error handling, and code deduplication. No blocking issues.

notes: pallet-icn-bft security verified. Root-only extrinsics properly enforced. Input validation present (max 5 directors). Saturating arithmetic throughout. MEDIUM: unbounded iteration in prune_old_consensus mitigated by Root-only access. No blockers found.

summary: Excellent code quality with comprehensive test coverage (28/28 tests passing). Follows FRAME best practices, maintains SOLID principles, and has low technical debt (2/10). No blocking issues. Must replace placeholder weights before mainnet.
